alert.note: Alert for White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 5:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times, decreasing later this morning. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, leading to areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Pinetop-Lakeside and Show Low. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 4 AM Today to 11 AM Today: Alpine 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 2 to 4 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
